CustomField.description: GTMS-6421: Indicates annual revenue commitment of partner GTMS-13488 : updated values based on partner tier values
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Partner_Tier__c,'Silver'),'$100K', IF(ISPICKVAL( Partner_Tier__c,'Gold'),'$500K', IF(ISPICKVAL( Partner_Tier__c,'Platinum'),'$1.5M','None')))
CustomField.label: Annual Revenue Commit
